channel.description: Consume Okta requests from your SCIM app Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: See existing content field for more details. Links to original docs: - Connect your SCIM API service to Okta: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/scim-provisioning-integration-connect/main/ - Non OIN related content only Structure type: Task Content type: How-to without code A “How-to without code” illustrates how to perform a specific task that does not rely on writing code.
